valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 15 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 16 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low 450 miles west of Rockall 980 expected Shannon 989 by 0600 tomorrow. New low expected Forties 993 by same time
